name: Annoying Radio: Stay Tuned
description:
Controls

Use the buttons on the radio. 

 Frequency Buttons - Changes the red frequency bar value. 

 Mouse Wheel - Change Volume

Meet the world's most annoying radio.

Let me warn you in advance, it will take a lot of work to stay tuned.

The squirrel wants to listen to the radio, but the radio frequency does not remain constant.

Our aim is to ensure that our squirrel can listen to the music without going into rage. 

Use the frequency buttons to move the red bar and make it follow the green bar.

Credits

Kaan Salı - Game Designer, Programmer

Umay Kaya - Game Artist
